FlexCard-Based Claim 360 Component for Insurance 

To configure the FlexCard-based Claim 360 component, assign OmniStudio permissions and the FSC Insurance permission set license to users, and customize the FlexCards, Integration Procedures, and Omnistudio Data Mappers.
